data.title: James Bond: Licence to Kill. From the motion picture written by Michael G. Wilson and Richard Maibaum
data.meta_description: The Armchair Detective Library, 1989. SIGNED FIRST UK HARDBACK EDITION, preceeding the cloth-bound 'Collector' and 'Limited' issues. SIGNED by the author in black ink to title page. Publisher's black cloth in glossy dust-jacket, with the cancelled title-page showing the British spelling 'Licence' , as called for. A fine copy of a scarce book. John Gardner's first film novelisation starring Ian Fleming's James Bond. Item #45225
data.text:
GARDNER, John (1926-2007).

The Armchair Detective Library, 1989. SIGNED FIRST UK HARDBACK EDITION, preceeding the cloth-bound 'Collector' and 'Limited' issues. SIGNED by the author in black ink to title page. Publisher's black cloth in glossy dust-jacket, with the cancelled title-page (showing the British spelling 'Licence'), as called for. A fine copy of a scarce book. John Gardner's first film novelisation starring Ian Fleming's James Bond. Item #45225

Hubin; Crime Fiction IV.
